case_circumstances: The individual was found along with 2 other deceased traveling companions (NamUs #'s 10331 and 8712; name associations of Agustin Antonio Castro and Manuel Ortiz, respectively) in a remote desert area known for migrant activity by USBP after being alerted to their location by a fellow member of their party.   The deceased was in possession of a Mexican birth certificate with the name association of " Manuel Pu Meregildo" but he is of suspected Guatamalan nationality and it is unclear whether this is his real name.
case_head_hair: Wavy and appoximately 4 cm in length.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_on_body: One pair of blue jeans. One pair of blue or black "Dickies" brand underpants. One pair of black with red and white striped ankle socks.
case_footwear: One pair of size 9 white or brown with orange tennis shoes.
case_other_items_with_body: One brown woven leather belt with white metal buckle. One red comb.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
